en: Officers at the Mountain Branch of the National Home for Disabled Volunteer Soldiers

A composite photo of the officers of the Mountain Branch of the National Home for Disabled Volunteer Soldiers. They are: Capt. Kyle M. King, Col. John P. Smith, Major Cy H. Lyle, Capt. C.Y. Deaderick, Rev. James A. Ruble, Major W.T. Erwin, Capt. W.E.F Milburn, Edwin P. Desmond (chaplain).  There is an interesting emblem of wings in the center.
Era 7 - The Emergence of Modern America (1890-1930)
